formatDescription: Prj is the 3D Studio (DOS) project-file format. The original 3D Studio product was created for the DOS platform by the Yost Group, and published by Autodesk.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
